group_1.textRight: I'm sorry to have you come here,@but we're not ordering anything today...huh?

group_1.textLeft: What? No, I'm not believing in rumors@or anything like that.

group_1.narration: Many cold, persistent gazes@are directed towards me...@I could tell that these people were lying.
I bumped into someone who used to come@to the store and ask for fruit punch,@and his reaction was the same.

group_1.textCenter: ...No, I don't want to get involved in trouble...

group_1.narration: His face told me to get out of town.
No matter where I went or how I talked to them,@they all reacted the same way...@They treated me like I was a criminal.
I indeed have no identity@and many things are suspicious about me.
But wasn't it you who tried to accept me?
If this is how things would have turned out,@they shouldn't have bothered from the beginning.
Don't give me false hope...@that I can have a normal life...

group_1.textCenter: I can't remember...@but it doesn't matter anymore...

group_1.narration: Inside the convenience store,@people who noticed me are whispering something...@I feel so uncomfortable...@I can't stay in this town anymore.
I have to escape from this place full of malice.
Yes... It's no good to have strangers around.@We have to go to a world where it's just the two of us,@where there is no one else but Hanna...

group_1.textCenter: ...Huh?@I was in the convenience store a while ago...
Before I realized it, I ended up walking this far...

group_1.textRight: ...Found you, Sena.
I was searching for you...@You were here.
...It's a bit late, but I'm glad it didn't affect me.
When someone searches for you,@they get taken to Endless Mirrors.

group_1.textLeft: If strangers search for me, that's what happens.@But you're not a stranger, Hanna.

group_1.textRight: I see...well, whatever it was,@I'm glad I found you.
My duty is to find you!
Hah?
Hahaha...

group_1.textLeft: ...Hey, Hanna. Let's go to a different town.@This place is already...

group_1.textRight: When we had crepes and played around before...
You seemed so happy.@It was the first time I saw you like that...
Yeah... It has been a long time.

group_1.textLeft: ...Because now, I can do things I couldn't before.

group_1.textRight: It's not over.
If you can smile like that again...
I'll even crush this place!

group_1.textLeft: Crush it...@What are you going to do?

group_1.textRight: Did you forget? I'm the Chaotic Villain.

group_1.narration: "I alone am enough@to plunge this town into chaos."

group_1.textRight: Let's go, Sena.
We are going to crush this serial attacker bullshit.
...It's much more believable than justice, isn't it?
Hahaha...well, I'm the only villain,@you are innocent.
Haha... You don't have to be evil.
Don't worry, I'm by your side.
You are absolutely pure.
Now, take my hand, let's go for revenge!

group_1.narration: And then, I took Hanna's hand@and ran towards the sparkling sunset.@She always takes me to sparkling,@beautiful places...
When I'm in pain or sad,@she always finds me and saves me.@She is quite...
